confirmEmail.success: Thank you for confirming your email.
confirmEmail.title: Confirmation of your email

emailNotConfirmed.message: Your email has not been confirmed. Check your emails to find the verification email. You can also click on the following button to receive it again.
emailNotConfirmed.seeEmail: See your email to find the verification messages
emailNotConfirmed.title: Unconfirmed email

no_access.notWithinDateRange: Your user account is currently inactive

forgotPassword.instructions: Enter the email associated with your account. An email message will be sent to you allowing you to choose a new password.
forgotPassword.seeEmail: See your email to find the reset messages
forgotPassword.title: Reset your password

identity.ExternalLoginExists: A user with that external login already exists.
identity.InvalidUserName: User name {0} is invalid, can only contain letters or digits.
identity.LockoutNotEnabled: Lockout is not enabled for this user.
identity.PasswordRequireDigit: Passwords must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').
identity.PasswordRequireLower: Passwords must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').
identity.PasswordRequireNonLetterOrDigit: Passwords must have at least one non letter or digit character.
identity.PasswordTooShort: Passwords must be at least {0} characters.
identity.UserAlreadyHasPassword: User already has a password set.

register.passwordMustMatch: Password and confirmation must be the same
register.title: Register

resetPassword.success: Your password has been successfully changed.
